title: Emerald & Polki Diamond Chandrani Haar with Pearl Drops
materials: Freshwater Pearls. The polki diamonds are carefully selected for their brilliance and clarity.
features: This Chandrani Haar features a layered design with intricate floral and paisley motifs handcrafted with Polki diamonds. Emeralds are strategically placed for a pop of color and visual interest. Dainty freshwater pearls are elegantly suspended along the bottom edge, adding a touch of traditional charm. The centerpiece is a larger paisley pendant with a central emerald, further adorned with polki diamonds. Features a secure adjustable clasp. The back of the piece is intricately finished for comfort and visual appeal.
occasions: and festive occasions. Also suitable for modern celebrations and formal events where you want to make a statement.
description: This Chandrani Haar is a stunning blend of traditional South Indian design and modern aesthetics. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and emeralds gives it a regal look and feel. The Hyderabadi polish adds a touch of timeless elegance, making it a treasured heirloom piece. Each stone is meticulously set by expert artisans, ensuring exceptional craftsmanship and durability.
